RING_BUFFER_CFG

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x38
Size:
0x4

Description

Ring buffer configuration

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:4] rsv rw 0x0 -
[3:2] mode_selector rw 0x0 -
[1] clear_irq rw 0x0 -
[0] trigger rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

rsv

Unused

mode_selector

Mode selector: 2'b00 or 2'b11 for trigger from watermark, 2'b01 for register trigger and 2'b10 for external trigger (default: 2'b00)

clear_irq

Clear IRQ lines

trigger

Software-initiated trigger
